name: Bchat
body:
# BChat Chat Realtime dengan Firebase. Silahkan dikembangkan gan, dan jangan lupa di Fork & Like :D Dibuat menggunakan: - Bootstrap - jQuery - Javascript - Firebase - PHP Fitur: - Realtime - Send by Enter - Safe Word - Sound Notification - Chat Count in Titlebar - Send Link - Send Image

Setting

> Setting firebase pada 'BChat v2.js' pada bagian 'https://baychat-548c8.firebaseio.com/' ganti dengan alamat akun firebase kalian. > ![](https://s16.postimg.org/o3cdpifqt/BChat.jpg) # [DEMO](http://chat.bayyu.me) # [LICENSE](https://github.com/MuhBayu/BChat/blob/master/LICENSE)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
